column1: Name / Purpose
[title_desc name="Sprite Fixer" desc="Make some simple changes to Sprites" /]

[title_desc name="Auto Seamer" desc="Create a seamless tileable texture from an input image" /]

[title_desc name="360" desc="View and edit VMT files for Source" /]
[title_desc name="Color Logo Maker" desc="Create colored logos for Half-Life" /]
[title_desc name="dDo" desc="dDo Legacy, free for commercial Use, pre PBR, great texturing tool plugin for Photoshop" /]
[title_desc name="Decal converter" desc="Turn images into Decal files (WAD format)" /]

[title_desc name="Gimp tools" desc="Small collection of GIMP plugins for Valves Engines" /]

[title_desc name="Quick Tiler" desc="Photoshop plugin that creates tiled images for game" /]
[title_desc name="Redfield plugins" desc="Photoshop plugins for simplifying the creation of textures for games" /]

[title_desc name="Sprite Fixer" desc="Useful for locking sprites to Z-axis rotations." /]

[title_desc name="Half-Life Texture Tools" desc="Half-Life Texture Tools - create and view wad and spr files" /]

" /]
[title_desc name="Sprite generator" desc="Sprite generator for HL " /]

[title_desc name="Terrain Texture Generator" desc="Here's a little toy that synthesizes a unique terrain texture
by blending a set of base texture layers" /]

[title_desc name="SkyGen" desc="This is a simple seamless skybox bitmap generator. It generates
six bitmaps which can be used as the textures on a skybox within
a game engine" /]
[title_desc name="TGA Tool" desc="Simple Interface program to allow the easy editing of the 24 bit Bmp & 32 bit Targas" /]
[title_desc name="SkyPaint" desc="Skypaint is a legacy program that can view and create skyboxes as well as doing direct edits to them." /]
[title_desc name="VMT Creator" desc="Simple vmt creator" /]

[title_desc name="Source Material Manager" desc="Source Material Manager is an application to manage VTF and VMT files. SMM makes your texture and material editing faster!" home_link="https://github.com/RadCraftplay/Source-Material-Manager" /]
[title_desc name="VMT Editor" desc="a visual editor for Source Engine material files." home_link="https://gortnar.com/vmt.html" /]

[title_desc name="VMTGen" desc="Valve Material Type file generator " home_link="https://github.com/Xyphos/VMTGen" /]

[title_desc name="JamDonut" desc="Older tool for creating textures in Quake & HL" /]
